title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 353.1 - Introduction and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 353.1 - Introduction and applicability

State Regulations

This Part implements subdivision 5 of section
211
of the

Social Services Law, as amended by chapter 41 of the Laws of 1992 (section
137). Section 211 authorizes recovery of payments made from State and local
funds for basic needs of individuals whose applications for Supplemental

Security Income (SSI) are pending or whose SSI benefits are retroactively
reinstated after a period of suspension or termination. This Part applies to
any SSI paid as a retroactive lump sum after the effective date of the

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
353.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
